body.name: Perixx PERIMICE-519 Wired Ergonomic Vertical Mouse - Portable Small Design - 105x67x58 mm - Right Handed Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Perixx USA and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ERGONOMIC MOUSE: Vertical mouse promotes better positioning of the wrist and forearm while operating the mouse for more comfort; Suitable for long working hours; Portable size mouse that will not need much space to be carried around while travelling

CONVENIENT DESIGN - A 6-button layout with built-in DPI switch button; You can switch DPI between 800/1600; Easy access layout with side buttons mapped as shortcuts for forwards and backwards the navigating history; Dimensions: 4.13 x 2.64 x 2.28 inches (10.5 x 6.7 x 5.8 cm)

SMOOTH TRACKING MOVEMENT - The advanced optical tracking sensor provides smooth and accurate tracking movement on any type of surface; The USB wired version (with the length cable of 5.9 feet (1.8 meters)) offers stable connection to your computer
SILENT-CLICK MOUSE - Suitable for those who needs a silent working environment, whether preference or limiting distractions when working

WIDE COMPATIBILITY - Supports HID (Human Interface Device) spec; Designed for Windows 7, 8, 10 (Note: All of the features will work with Mac operating system); Easy installation with easy Plug and Play feature, no drivers needed; Package Includes: 1x PERIMICE-519, 1x manual
body.description: Perixx PERIMICE-519 Small Vertical Mouse PERIMICE-519 is a wired ergonomic vertical mouse with six easy-reach buttons. Due to its compact size and weight, this mouse is travel-friendly and suitable for smaller hand-size users. Comfortable Grip and Smooth Surface The surface of the mouse is coated with a smooth rubberized surface for a comfortable grip that will last all day.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 2,925 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perixx PERIMICE-519 Small Vertical Mouse PERIMICE-519 is a wired ergonomic vertical mouse with six easy-reach buttons. Due to its compact size and weight, this mouse is travel-friendly and suitable for smaller hand-size users. Comfortable Grip and Smooth Surface The surface of the mouse is coated with a smooth rubberized surface for a comfortable grip that will last all day. Specifications: Ergonomic Vertical Mouse Plug and Play Wired USB Interface DPI Switch: 800/1600 Cable Length: 5.9 feet Dimensions: 4.13 x 2.64 x 2.28 inches Weight: 0.24 lb. System Requirements: Windows 7, 8, 10, and later versions

Features: Ergonomic Vertical Mouse The vertical design lets your hand lay in the most natural position without twisting your wrist while gripping the mouse. You can control your cursor comfortably without putting too much unnatural pressure on your wrist. Compact and Lightweight This mouse is a small design that can be used for people with small to medium-sized hands. It is also suitable for travel enthusiasts. By choosing the proper size of your own mouse, muscle soreness from excessively contracting the hand can be improved in the long term. 6 Buttons with Silent Click Besides six control buttons with a silent click, PERIMICE-519 is equipped with DPI switches for easy mouse sensitivity adjustment. The six-button design includes two internet browsing side buttons, for extremely smooth surfing.

About Perixx Perixx founded in 2006 in Germany, is a solution provider of computer peripherals, specializing in input/output devices, keyboards, and computer mice. Perixx's consumer and professional product portfolio is versatile across various applications from industrial and professional to personal usage. The growing need for customers has been our motivation for continuous evolution. As a 'Value Creator', Perixx strives to meet and exceed customer’s expectations. We are here to inspire you with sophisticated product quality and fast customer communication.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse cursor stops
reviews.reviewText: Updated to 1 star. Mouse continues to decline and the pros do not outweigh the cons. Mouse lags A LOT. So frustrating. Will have to switch to my old mouse for now.When I move the mouse around the cursor will pause and I have to shake the mouse to get it to move. It is so frustrating. It worked well the first month then went down hill even after a full night’s charge. I wanted to love it as it fit perfectly in my petite hands and felt really soft. Overall, I would not recommend.Update: excellent customer services I emailed customer service on the perixx website and they exchanged the product for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for smaller hands
reviews.reviewText: I started noticing pain in my right hand/wrist and figured I should get an ergonomic mouse before it gets worse. I tried a several different mice that friends and coworkers recommended, but none of them were comfortable. I'm 5'1" with small hands, so when I saw this "mini" ergonomic mouse, I immediately ordered it. It fits my hand perfectly and the pain is much better since using it. It also was very easy to get used to since the angle isn't too extreme. Only issue is that I sometimes have to toggle the on/off switch to get it working if it's been a few hours and my computer went to sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels Good to The Touch
reviews.reviewText: **UPDATE 05/2023**Mouse stopped working. I replaced the AA battery already once before, but today, even with another fresh battery, there's no functionality. Very sad about the lack of longevity with this purchase.======================="One size does not fit all," is the best adage for searching for the most suitable small, vertical mouse. It's like trying on a pair of glasses: you have to try on many pairs, and the one you pick probably won't suit someone else. So it is with my search for the best mouse for me, and my small female hands. This mouse won out because it fit and didn't cause added distress or pain to my hand. The matte finish creates a nice soft texture to touch. The buttons near and above the thumb are easy to get to and don't accidentally 'get in the way'. The click is silent and soft. Searching for a new mouse has taught me to listen to my body's needs, and not necessarily the reviews of others. To each their own!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable for small hands
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite ergonomic mouse and it fits my small hand. I even can play games with it but it is not as good as gaming mouse. The scrolling sometimes scrolls back up even though you're scrolling down. Not a huge issue but it's something you notice. I still recommend this if you have small hands and need a cheap ergonomic mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for a travel mouse. I had never heard of the company before but really liked the ergonomic profile and smaller size of this mouse. It has performed very well so far. The ergonomics are some of the best I have used. The customization software is easy to use and the performance is top notch. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a desktop or travel mouse with comfortable design and great ergonomics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Light weight but charging issue
reviews.reviewText: I have used it almost 6 months now. I love how light and perfect fit for my small woman hand. If it had a resting edge for my pinky and the charging would actually charge up to 100%, I would give it 5 stars. It stops charge at max 67%. Not sure if anyone else has the same issue??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A mouse to love
reviews.reviewText: I decided I needed an ergonomic mouse. I knew nothing about which one to get. I went to trusted websites and found several that recommended this one along with much more expensive ones. I just started using it and it's great. I have small hands and this one fits me well. I thought it would take time to get accustomed to vertical mouse, but it's very intuitive and comfortable. It's bluetooth, so I had to plug in the USB just long enough to pair it with my laptop. Then I removed it and put it in the slot on the mouse where it is stored, happy to have a USB port freed up. It's rechargeable too, so no need to replace batteries. The pointer is a curate and the scroll wheel feels just right. Why spend more when this is everything I need?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY - SCROLL WHEEL STOPS WORKING WITHIN 6 MONTHS OF DAILY USE
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this mouse for a year for daily light use of about 2-4 hours a day. From a grip and posture standpoint, the mouse is comfortable for the price point. However, the build quality is terrible. Within 6 months, the scroll wheel began malfunctioning. While scrolling down physically on the wheel, it does not register properly and either does not scroll at all or scrolls up instead of down. As someone who uses the scroll wheel regularly for reading, this is a huge issue. For example, when using Maps for directions, the scroll wheel is useless to actually zoom in on any area and track anything on a map. I have to now look for a new mouse, as this one did not hold up for even 6 months of use; highly unsustainable. Save your money and buy a better mouse.

It's a good size for my hand (I'm average female). The angle is also very comfortable. The buttons don't require too much pressure which is perfect. The mouse is responding well. And the cable is long enough. The only thing that bothers me is that it's a little slippery to the touch. But not too much. So overall I'm happy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cómodo y de muy buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: Muy cómodo, para el trabajo diario. Los materiales se perciben y se sienten de muy buena calidad. Siento en lo personal que se adaptan a cualquier tipo de mano (grande, mediana y chica). Muy recomendable
O produti é muito bom, leve, ágil, e tem uma ótima textura.
Son comodos, aunque siento que pudieran serlo aun mas, se nota la diferencia con un raton estandar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Les dimensions sont parfaites pour ma main (alors que je suis un homme)
reviews.reviewText: J'utilise une souris de la marque Jelly Comb, qui est strictement identique à celle là.J'ai utilisé avant celle ci, d'autres souris ergonomiques, mais au final, je ne ressentais pas le confort tant désiré.J'ai fini par comprendre que les souris ergonomique classique, même pour ma grosse main sont 1/ trop grosses 2/ trop verticale 3/ et maintenant le design concave dans le creux de la main est juste insupportable pour moi.La souris Perimice est 1/ pile à la bonne taille 2/ légèrement moins inclinée ce qui me semble beaucoup plus naturel et me convient beaucoup mieux 3/ Bien arrondi et rempli parfaitement ma main.Du coup, je rachète une souris pour être sûr d'en avoir une d'avance !
